name: Power (itch) (Skullzrawk9)
description:
Two Cubes.

One Battery.

Galactic Consequences.

The time cube and the space cube are what keeps the galaxy in balance. However, a parsitic evil known as the Scourge took possession of both cubes and hid them on a planet known as Earth with nefarious purposes in mind. As the Galactic Protector, it's up to you to find both cubes to put an end to the Scourge and bring equilibrium to the galaxy.

Do you have what it takes?

(Created for EAE 2100 as a class project)
